H0.text: Which animated film, created by Dream Works Animations, is the highest-grossing film worldwide of 2009 so far? (May 2009). Monsters vs. Aliens

H1.text: Which animated film, created by Dream Works Animations, is the highest-grossing film worldwide of 2009 so far? (May 2009). Kung Fu Panda

H2.text: Which animated film, created by Dream Works Animations, is the highest-grossing film worldwide of 2009 so far? (May 2009). Shrek

H3.text: Which animated film, created by Dream Works Animations, is the highest-grossing film worldwide of 2009 so far? (May 2009). Ginormica

A4.text: Worldwide, it is the third-highest-grossing animated film of 2009 with a total of $381.7 million behind Up and Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs.

A5.text: It was a box-office success, grossing $381 million on a $175 million budget.

A6.text: Shrek generated more than $420 million in revenue for DreamWorks on DVD and VHS, and has sold more than 21 million copies of the 23 million shipped by January 2002.

A7.text: The film closed on December 6, 2001, after grossing $267.7 million domestically, along with $216.7 million overseas, for a worldwide total of $484.4 million.
